mapper.select: select i.item_name,i.item_code from sys_dictionary t ,sys_dictionary_item i where 1 = 1 and t.dictionary_code = #{code} and i.fk_dictionary_uuid = t.uuid order by i.cust_number01 ,i.item_code
select u.uuid as value,u.name from sys_user u,sys_user_role ur where 1=1 and ur.user_id=u.uuid and ur.role_id= #{roleId} and u.state='2'
select u.uuid as value,u.name from sys_user u,sys_user_role ur where 1=1 and ur.user_id=u.uuid and ur.code= #{code} and u.state='2'
select item_name from sys_dictionary_item where 1=1 and item_code= #{code}
SELECT ${key} KEY, VALUE FROM SYNC_BUSINESS_MODEL WHERE DIC_TYPE = '3' ORDER BY to_number(ID)
select key,value from sync_business_model where 1=1 and state='1' and parent_id in (${parent_id})

select o.ORGPKVALUE as id, o.PARENTPKVALUE as pid, o.NAME, o.ISPARENT, o.CATEGORYCODE from sys_org_ext o where 1=1 and o.CATEGORYCODE='Org'
and o.PARENTPKVALUE = #{parentId}
and o.PARENTPKVALUE is null
order by o.CATEGORYCODE, o.CODE

SELECT T.* FROM( SELECT MA.PROJECTID, MA.PROJECTNAME, /*项目名称*/ MA.PROJECTCODE, /*存储用编码*/ MA.PROJECTCODENEW, /*显示用编码*/ SO.ORGPKVALUE REPORTINGUNITCODE, /*申报单位编码*/ SO.NAME AS REPORTINGUNITNAME, /*申报单位组织名称*/ SO.ORGPKVALUE ORGCODE, /*所属大区编码*/ SO.NAME AS ORGNAME, /*所属大区名称*/ SO.ID, SGUR.COMPANYHEADER_NAME ORGHEADERNAME, /*项目归属单位负责人*/ SGUR.COMPANYHEADER_ID ORGHEADERID, /*项目归属单位负责人ID*/ (SELECT SU.NAME FROM SYS_USER SU WHERE SU.UUID = MP.RESPONSIBLEUSERKEY) RESPONSIBLEUSER, /*投资经理*/ (SELECT SU.UUID FROM SYS_USER SU WHERE SU.UUID = MP.RESPONSIBLEUSERKEY) RESPONSIBLEUSERID, /*投资经理ID*/ (SELECT MAR.ENUMNAME FROM ZSJ.MDM_AREA MAR WHERE MAR.PK_ENUM = MA.PROVINCE_NAME) || (SELECT MAR.ENUMNAME FROM ZSJ.MDM_AREA MAR WHERE MAR.PK_ENUM = MA.CITY_NAME) || (SELECT MAR.ENUMNAME FROM ZSJ.MDM_AREA MAR WHERE MAR.PK_ENUM = MA.COUNTY_NAME) ADDRESS, /*项目所在地*/ CASE WHEN MA.BIZTYPEENUMCODE LIKE '101%' THEN '1401' WHEN MA.BIZTYPEENUMCODE LIKE '104%' THEN '1401' WHEN MA.BIZTYPEENUMCODE LIKE '102%' THEN '1402' WHEN MA.BIZTYPEENUMCODE LIKE '106%' THEN '1403' WHEN MA.BIZTYPEENUMCODE LIKE '105%' THEN '1404' WHEN MA.BIZTYPEENUMCODE LIKE '107%' THEN '1405' WHEN MA.BIZTYPEENUMCODE LIKE '108%' THEN '1406' WHEN MA.BIZTYPEENUMCODE LIKE '109%' THEN '1407' ELSE '' END SERVICETYPE, /*业务类型*/ MA.BIZTYPEENUMCODE, MA.PROVINCE_NAME, MA.CITY_NAME, MA.COUNTY_NAME, MA.CREATEDATETIME, MP.VERSIONTIME, MP.PROJECTSTAGEENUMCODE, MP.RESPONSIBLEUSERKEY, ROW_NUMBER()over(partition by Ma.PROJECTCODENEW order by mp.VERSIONTIME desc) as idx FROM ZSJ.MDM_APRO MA, ZSJ.MDM_PROINFOHIS MP, SYS_ORG so, SYS_GROUP_USER_REPORTINGUNIT SGUR WHERE 1 = 1 AND MA.PROJECTID = MP.PROJECTID AND SGUR.REPORTINGUNIT_ID(+) = MP.STAGEBELONGTODEPTKEY AND SO.ORGPKVALUE(+) = MP.STAGEBELONGTODEPTKEY AND MA.PROJECTTYPEENUMCODE = '10' AND MP.PROJECTSTAGEENUMCODE = '10' AND MP.RESPONSIBLEUSERKEY = '${USERID}' ) T WHERE 1 = 1 and T.PROJECTNAME like '%${projectname}%' and T.SERVICETYPE in (${serviceTypeId}) AND T.idx = 1 ORDER BY T.PROJECTCODE, T.CREATEDATETIME DESC

select i.uuid, i.item_name from sys_dictionary_item i where i.item_code like '03%' and i.is_enabled = '1' and exists( select * from sys_business_attachment r where i.uuid = r.attachment_uuid and r.state='1' and r.fuctiontype='${fuctionType}' and exists( select * from sync_business_model b where r.business_id=b.id and b.key in (${projectTypes}) and b.dic_type='${dicTypes}' and b.state='1' ) )
select * from sync_business_model b where state='1' and parent_id in (select id from sync_business_model where type_id='1')

SELECT ATTACHMENT_CODE ITEM_CODE, ATTACHMENT_NAME ITEM_NAME FROM SYS_BUSINESS_ATTACHMENT SBA WHERE STATE = 1 AND SBA.BUSINESS_NAME = '${projectModelName}' AND SBA.FUCTIONTYPE = '${functionType}' AND SBA.SERVICECODE = '${serviceCode}' ORDER BY ATTACHMENT_CODE ASC

SELECT SO.NAME, SO.CODE, SO.ORGPKVALUE, SO.PARENTCODE, LEVEL, SGUR.COMPANYHEADER_NAME ORGHEADERNAME, SGUR.COMPANYHEADER_ID ORGHEADERID FROM SYS_ORG SO, SYS_GROUP_USER_REPORTINGUNIT SGUR WHERE SO.PARENTCODE = '${CODE}' AND SGUR.REPORTINGUNIT_ID(+) = SO.ORGPKVALUE START WITH SO.ORGPKVALUE = '${ORGCODE}' CONNECT BY PRIOR SO.PARENTCODE = SO.CODE

SELECT RMPI."id", RMPI."appointment_meeting_id", RMPI."type_code", RMPI."meeting_theme", RMPI."meeting_content", RMPI."chairman", RMPI."committee_member", to_char(RMPI."meeting_begin_time", 'yyyy-mm-dd,hh24:mi:ss') "meeting_begin_time", to_char(RMPI."meeting_end_time", 'yyyy-mm-dd,hh24:mi:ss') "meeting_end_time", RMPI."flag" FROM RCM_MEETING_PREP_INFO RMPI WHERE RMPI."flag" = '0' AND RMPI."meeting_begin_time" > sysdate ORDER BY RMPI."id" DESC
